lyric:
[00:00.62]Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
[00:06.28]Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
[00:12.57]A broken heart is all that's left
[00:18.12]I'm still fixing all the cracks
[00:22.94]Lost a couple of pieces when
[00:27.75]I carried it, carried it, carried it home
[00:32.78]I'm afraid of all I am
[00:38.07]My mind feels like a foreign land
[00:42.89]Silence ringing inside my head
[00:47.71]Please, carry me, carry me, carry me home
[00:53.18]I spent all of the love I've saved
[00:56.87]We were always a losing game
[00:59.68]Small-town boy in a big arcade
[01:03.42]I got addicted to a losing game
[01:07.03]Ooh, ooh
[01:12.50]All I know, all I know
[01:16.51]Loving you is a losing game
[01:21.40]How many pennies in the slot?
[01:26.22]Giving us up didn’t take a lot
[01:31.39]I saw the end 'fore it begun
[01:36.23]Still I carried, I carried, I carried on
[01:41.10]Ooh, ooh
[01:47.28]All I know, all I know
[01:51.30]Loving you is a losing game
[01:54.82]Ooh, ooh
[02:00.50]All I know, all I know
[02:04.83]Loving you is a losing game
[02:08.52]I don't need your games, game over
[02:15.35]Get me off this rollercoaster
[02:21.70]Ooh, ooh
[02:27.29]All I know, all I know
[02:31.47]Loving you is a losing game
[02:34.88]Ooh, ooh
[02:40.65]All I know, all I know
[02:44.85]Loving you is a losing game
[02:50.09]Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
[02:56.39]Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
tlyric:
[by:Trap_Girl]
[00:00.62]
[00:06.28]
[00:12.57]只剩下一颗破碎的心
[00:18.12]我试图修补这些裂纹
[00:22.94]果然，破碎的也是迷失的
[00:27.75]当我试图带这破碎的心回家
[00:32.78]我的一切让我心生畏惧
[00:38.07]我的思绪飘荡在陌生之地
[00:42.89]宁寂在我脑海里呼喊回响
[00:47.71]带我回家吧，带我回家
[00:53.18]我耗尽了我所有的爱
[00:56.87]可我们的爱仍然寂寂无终
[00:59.68]明明只是个游乐场里的小城男孩
[01:03.42]可我却迷上了这徒劳的爱情游戏
[01:07.03]Ooh, ooh
[01:12.50]尽我所知的是
[01:16.51]在这爱里我注定失败
[01:21.40]投币口里得放几便士？
[01:26.22]叫停这爱却花不了多少
[01:31.39]纵然伊始，我早已料到结局
[01:36.23]可我不想放弃，仍然坚持着
[01:41.10]Ooh, ooh
[01:47.28]尽我所知的是
[01:51.30]在这爱里我注定失败
[01:54.82]Ooh, ooh
[02:00.50]尽我所知的是
[02:04.83]在这爱里我注定失败
[02:08.52]我不需要这游戏，游戏结束
[02:15.35]让我从这这跌宕起伏的游戏里抽身
[02:21.70]Ooh, ooh
[02:27.29]尽我所知的是
[02:31.47]在这爱里我注定失败
[02:34.88]Ooh, ooh
[02:40.65]尽我所知的是
[02:44.85]在这爱里我注定失败
[02:50.09]Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
[02:56.39]Ooh-ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
